comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.7; rv:9.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/9.0
Build ID: 20111109112850

Steps to reproduce:

acceptednightly update


Actual results:

continuous loop error message to apple
Process:         firefox [5666]
Path:            /Applications/Nightly.app/Contents/MacOS/firefox
Identifier:      org.mozilla.nightly
Version:         11.0a1 (11.0a1)
Code Type:       X86-64 (Native)
Parent Process:  launchd [122]

Date/Time:       2011-11-12 18:16:19.448 -0600
OS Version:      Mac OS X 10.7.2 (11C74)
Report Version:  9

Interval Since Last Report:          544936 sec
Crashes Since Last Report:           22
Per-App Interval Since Last Report:  145169 sec
Per-App Crashes Since Last Report:   17
Anonymous UUID:                      BE2693F9-EC2A-4F76-A248-0FD5BF1744FD

Crashed Thread:  0  Dispatch queue: com.apple.main-thread

Exception Type:  EXC_BAD_ACCESS (SIGSEGV)
Exception Codes: KERN_INVALID_ADDRESS at 0xffffffffffffffff

VM Regions Near 0xffffffffffffffff:
--> shared memory          00007fffffe00000-00007fffffe02000 [    8K] r-x/r-x SM=SHM  
    

Application Specific Information:
objc[5666]: garbage collection is OFF

Thread 0 Crashed:: Dispatch queue: com.apple.main-thread
0   org.mozilla.nightly           	0x0000000100001634 _ZL15ReadDependentCBPKcb + 180
1   org.mozilla.nightly           	0x0000000100001297 XPCOMGlueLoadDependentLibs(char const*, void (*)(char const*, bool)) + 247
2   org.mozilla.nightly           	0x00000001000013e7 XPCOMGlueLoad(char const*, unsigned int (**)(XPCOMFunctions*, char const*)) + 135
3   org.mozilla.nightly           	0x000000010000131a XPCOMGlueStartup + 58
4   org.mozilla.nightly           	0x0000000100000cc1 main + 321
5   org.mozilla.nightly           	0x0000000100000ac4 start + 52

Thread 0 crashed with X86 Thread State (64-bit):
  rax: 0xffffffffffffffff  rbx: 0xffffffffffffffff  rcx: 0x0000000000000002  rdx: 0x0000000000000001
  rdi: 0x0000000000000016  rsi: 0x0000000000000000  rbp: 0x0000000000000004  rsp: 0x00007fff5fbfe5f0
   r8: 0x0000000000000004   r9: 0x0000000000000000  r10: 0x00007fff8daf3ad2  r11: 0x0000000000000202
  r12: 0x00007fff5fbfe6b0  r13: 0x0000000000000000  r14: 0x0000000100001580  r15: 0x00007fff79659f60
  rip: 0x0000000100001634  rfl: 0x0000000000010286  cr2: 0xffffffffffffffff
Logical CPU: 1

comments.raw_text:
On 3 different OSX device ( 2 Imac and 1 mac book air) up to date i don't have any update issue. I also try to run a VM with an osx without recent update (since november) and don't succeed to reproduce.

I think this bug can be closed
